      • animateTo

        public void animateTo(GeoPoint gp,
             MapControllerOld.AnimationType aAnimationType)
        Deprecated. 
        Animates the underlying MapView that it centers the passed GeoPoint in the end. Uses: MapControllerOld.ANIMATION_SMOOTHNESS_DEFAULT and MapControllerOld.ANIMATION_DURATION_DEFAULT.
        Parameters:
        gp -

      • animateTo

        public void animateTo(GeoPoint gp,
             MapControllerOld.AnimationType aAnimationType,
             int aSmoothness,
             int aDuration)
        Deprecated. 
        Animates the underlying MapView that it centers the passed GeoPoint in the end.
        Parameters:
        gp - GeoPoint to be centered in the end.
        aSmoothness - steps made during animation. I.e.: MapControllerOld.ANIMATION_SMOOTHNESS_LOW, MapControllerOld.ANIMATION_SMOOTHNESS_DEFAULT, MapControllerOld.ANIMATION_SMOOTHNESS_HIGH
        aDuration - in Milliseconds. I.e.: MapControllerOld.ANIMATION_DURATION_SHORT, MapControllerOld.ANIMATION_DURATION_DEFAULT, MapControllerOld.ANIMATION_DURATION_LONG

        aDuration - in Milliseconds. I.e.: MapControllerOld.ANIMATION_DURATION_SHORT, MapControllerOld.ANIMATION_DURATION_DEFAULT, MapControllerOld.ANIMATION_DURATION_LONG
